{{Infobox figure skater |name= Jonathan Cassar |image= |caption= |fullname = Jonathan James Cassar |country= [[United States of America|United States]] |birth_date= {{birth date and age|1986|12|04}} |birth_place= [[Rochester, MI]] |hometown=Waterford Township, MI |residence= Lake Arrowhead, CA |coach=Frank Carroll |former coaches= Julianne Berlin and Jason Dungjen |choreographer= David Wilson |skating club= All Year FSC former skating club= Detroit SC, INC. | }}
'''Jonathan Cassar''' is an American [[figure skater]] who has competed at the senior [[United States Figure Skating Championships|U.S. Championships]] three times. He was also the silver medalist at the 2008 U.S. Collegiate Championships.<ref>[http://www.usfsa.org/content/events/200809/uscollegiatechamps/seniormen-protocols.pdf 2008US Collegiate Championships protocol]</ref>
==Career== Cassar started to skate at age 8 because his father played hockey at the Detroit Skating Club.<ref>[http://web.icenetwork.com/skaters/detail.jsp?id=101090&mode=I Ice Network profile]</ref> He twice competed at the [[United States Figure Skating Championships|U.S. Championships]] as a junior. In 2008, his first year as a senior-level skater, he was unable to qualify for the US Championships.
In May 2010, Cassar announced that he was moving from Michigan to California to work with coach [[Frank Carroll]], who stated that a key goal was for Cassar to improve his consistency.<ref>[http://www.freep.com/article/20110130/SPORTS17/101300569/Canton-s-Meryl-Davis-Charlie-White-win-3rd-U-S-title-row Canton's Meryl Davis, Charlie White win 3rd U.S. title in row ]</ref> In 2010-11, he took part in the [[2010 Finlandia Trophy]]; he placed 7th. He then finished 11th at the [[2011 United States Figure Skating Championships|2011 US Nationals]].
Cassar began the 2011-12 season at the Ondrej Nepela Memorial, where he finished in 4th place.
Cassar is known for his excellent inside spread eagles, which are included as a feature in his programs.<ref name="IN9309">[http://web.icenetwork.com/news/article.jsp?ymd=20090903&content_id=6774658&vkey=ice_news The Inside Edge with Sarah and Drew 09/03/2009]</ref>
==Personal life== Cassar majored in dance at Oakland University in Rochester, Michigan.<ref name="IN9309" />
